appDesc.message: Don't waste your time with compliance. Universal Bypass automatically skips annoying link shorteners.

firstrunTitle.message: Thank you for installing Universal Bypass!

firstrunNoScript.message: However, you seem to be using NoScript or similar, which Universal Bypass is not compatible with.

optionsNavigationDelay.message: Take me to destinations after % second(s). (Use 0 to be navigated instantly.)

optionsInstantNavigationTrackers.message: Instantly take me to destinations of trackers.

optionsBlockIPLoggers.message: Block IP loggers if they can't be bypassed.

optionsCrowdBypass.message: Give and take the destinations of unbypassable shorteners.

optionsCrowdAutoOpen.message: Open crowd-sourced destinations in a new tab after % second(s). (0 = instant.)

optionsUserscriptsDescription.message: This is an advanced feature for developers to create their own scripts to bypass sites. Once perfected, they can then be submitted on GitHub to be added to Universal Bypass, so they're available to everyone.

beforeNavigateTimer.message: You will be redirected automatically in % seconds.

beforeNavigateTimerSingular.message: You will be redirected automatically in 1 second.

beforeNavigateOptions.message: Do you want to be redirected instantly or in x seconds?

blockedTitle.message: Universal Bypass prevented your IP from being logged.

blockedSubtitle.message: Don't want Universal Bypass to prevent bad actors from getting your IP?

crowdBypassed.message: You might not have to wait!

crowdBypassedInfo.message: Other Universal Bypass users have already waited for you and reported that this leads to %

crowdBypassedTimer.message: This will be opened in a new tab in % seconds.

crowdBypassedTimerSingular.message: This will be opened in a new tab in 1 second.

crowdBypassedOptions.message: Do you want this to be opened in a new tab instantly or in x seconds?
